title: France panorama. [No. 74/51]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Summit meeting - Brezhnev in Paris. 2. The arts - the works of Roseline Granet. 3. In the news: A New Year’s gift - a 40 meter Christmas tree offered by Quebec. Electric traction - cars, trucks and buses powered by electricity. 4. Bejart’s Goleston - transposing Iranian tradition.
